================================================================
Document Header
Copy and paste this tag in the <head> section of your HTML.
================================================================
<script>
    var adsmtag = adsmtag || {};
    adsmtag.cmd = adsmtag.cmd || [];
    (function () {
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.async = true;
        script.type = 'text/javascript';
        script.src = 'https:' + '//macro.adnami.io/adsm.macro.7e8da517-b142-4e4b-9607-7c2a2b5f9a0f.js';
        var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        node.parentNode.insertBefore(script, node);
    })();
</script>

================================================================
Document Body
Copy and paste these tags in the <body> section of your HTML.
Place each tag in the desired location of the associated <div>.
================================================================
<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_lb1_skn"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_lb2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_lb3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_header"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_sky1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_sky2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_sky3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_dsk_sky4"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_tab_lb1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_tab_lb2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_tab_lb3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_mob1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_mob2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_mob3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mmm_outstream"></div>
